label: AB2C_hP4_187_a_g_d-001
title: LiAgC$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
We do not use the lattice constants listed in Table 1 for (Kockelmann, 1999).  Instead we follow the ICSD and infer the lattice constants and $z_{3}$ from the distances given in Figure 1. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C_hP4_187_a_g_d-001}{LiAgC$_{2}$} and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C_hP4_187_a_g_d-002}{InTaS$_{2}$} have the same AFLOW label, AB2C\_hP4\_187\_a\_g\_d. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
